title: The Soleil Library (50+ Bks|Marvel+&hellip;|2008->|Minutemen)
description:
Overview:

    " Soleil Productions is a French publisher of both original and imported comic
      books. [...] In 2008, Marvel Comics [collaborated] with them on English 
      translations of several of their titles, including Sky Doll, Universal War
      One, Samurai: Legend, Scourge of the Gods and Ythaq: The Forsaken World. " 

     -- <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soleil_Productions" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soleil_Productions</a>

   For (predominantly French) outlines of the individual titles included here, see

     <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soleil_Productions#List_of_current_titles" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soleil_Productions#List_of_current_titles</a>
     <a href=" http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soleil_Productions#Alphab.C3.A9tique" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soleil_Productions#Alphab.C3.A9tique</a>


Contains:

   I couldn't find an official listing for the entirety of Marvel's Soleil line, but
   according to comicbookdb (  <a href=" http://comicbookdb.com/imprint.php?ID=394" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://comicbookdb.com/imprint.php?ID=394</a>   ) and
   another site (  <a href=" http://www.maelmill-insi.de/UHBMCC/serdad.htm#G485" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.maelmill-insi.de/UHBMCC/serdad.htm#G485</a>   ) which
   looks like it really knows what it's talking about, these are all of 'em. Plus,
   wherever available, scanlations (mostly by Alice) of any later issues, natch'! :)

   Sky Doll              (3+2+2+2   issues)   |   Spin Angels    (4+2   issues)
   Samurai               (4         issues)   |   Kookaburra     (3     issues)
   Universal War         (3+3+1     issues)   |   Daffodil       (3     issues)
   Scourge of the Gods   (3+3       issues)   |   Dragon Guard   (3+3   issues)
   Ythaq                 (3+3+5     issues)   |   Husk           (2     issues)
